data.text: This game is HORRIBLE! The amount of ads during my game play is just so annoying. In the ad for the game itself, you have plenty of options for outfits and it seems like there's much more to do. However, you literally always get the same hairs, same outfits, and the bot is always picking the wrong stuff. So, it's not even a challenge.

A game made simply to soak up ad revenue from bots and bored folk. No level select and after level 60 the levels begin to repeat. The goofy body modification is barely touched throughout the "game" so even playing it ironically just to laugh at the ridiculousness isn't worth the constant ad interruption every 20 seconds. If you're gonna make a trash ad grab game then at least go all out with the goofy body mods and allow folks a level select.

"build a queen?" more like "barf of a app" one problem is that they don't let you do -10 as a rating maybe it would be a good game if it let me play. and the one time it did it was glichy and I couldn't even finish 2 rounds before the screen went black. downloding this was a waist of my TIME I do not recemend. uninstaling right now. TERIBLE GAME

I give it a three because the first two levels they Don't have ADS then. Afternoon's first, who is starts to have ADS. Adds, then I look at the comments and then I thought it would be way worse. And they give you a specific one you have to do. Do not download this at all!!

I would rate this a 0. They gave me ADS every 2 seconds when I downloaded this app. I thought I was gonna be able to make my own outfit. They gave me outfits to fake and if I didn't complete that complete them. I would have failed. So I showed my friends this game. They got annoyed at it. I would not recommend downloading this I also got annoyed.

Sometimes there's ads that forcedly open a new window and when you come back the game resets, so you lost all the rewards and watched multiple ads in vain. Plus the last boyfriend (Fred from Scooby-Doo?) isn't on the boyfriends tab, so the moment you switch him for other you literally lose him forever and can't use him anymore nor get him again. Not the worst game ever but still not worth it at ALL, don't waste your time downloading

it's an okay game. the ads were just impossible to click out of so i couldn't even continue playing. as a person with a lot of patience, it took a very long time for me to decide to review this. if you have very little patience this game is not for you. i understand the ads are necessary but c'mon now, make it easier to click out of.

This game is awesome... The reason I gave it 4 stars is that after you finish all the levels you have to play the same levels again... The problem is that you should add more levels in the game... Not hating it it is just a suggestion... Otherwise this game is really nice though there are some adds...

I give this game 1 star because this game you have to make the "Perfect" girl and you have tp be "Good enough" to get a boyfriend when really anyone can get one and no one is perfect the percentage goes down when you pick "The wrong" one and makes them "Ugly" and there are so many ads and it glitches so much and its a boring game its repeating on just making the "most perfect" girl so thats why I give it a 1 star

I like this game but I wish that there weren't as many ads but there is a storyline at the end of each round and Iike that. There are creative levels as well and I love that you can reset the level if you're not happy. Xx 💞
The game has interesting designs, but there are many adds. It's easy to run out of things to buy for the characters room and you can't change character except during task.
I like the game but there are too many ads I don't recommend to play this unless u wanna watch a lot of ads there ads when u reach the end and if u help the little girl so don't recommend.
Too many ads, even to retry you watch an ad. Too aggressive. Uninstaller after 2 mins. Let me know when you change your strategy.

It is a annoying ads it comes every 2 seconds I just tried to play it and it's really bad I would give it a 0 star but I have to give it a one me and my brother played it and me and him said no we're giving it a one side it is so bad do not get it read these comments first I'm going to delete this now so I'm gonna go bye

Worst game ever. The whole level just keep repeating. No changes. U cant spend coin to buy anything. I feel sorry to buy ads pass in this game 😡

You don't need to build a queen because girl you are already one so that's why I giving it 5 stars because when you play it your the queen it made me think we need to stop wanting the perfect body just be thankful you are alive and healthy. If you are healthy but if you aren't I hope you get better soon.

it's really nice makes your kid easily e gets distracted easily and it's really good for kids and it makes the kids very happy and yeah according to me because I'm a kid I like it because it's interesting it has a lot of interest I have a lot of interest in this game and it's really good it's really good

Hi j just want to say that the game is interesting at when you play it until you reach level 50 it starts repeating adventure that you have already past I you should create more collections like lipsticks and so on not pet pet pet now the game is so boring and also why must It revolve around the girl and her boyfriend/husband relationship and please also when you are playing the game is must always hangs which makes you exit the game and come back but this game is good
Ads are not fun, kind of glitchy. Great game🤗 people really need to slow down the ads.

I gave this app 3 stars because it glitched a lot, and by the way... It's an offline and online game, so it makes no sense to be glitching anyway because I had my wi-fi on. I also gave this app 3 stars because the game starts repeating levels from the beginning sometime around level 70-ish. I like the game for the most part, but I'm deleting.

This game was good but there were many ads. This game could be fun for children but very addictive. After you complete building your house, there is no point of collecting money. Nothing special, just a normal game.

Downloaded just to review the game. It looks like a combination of enforcing some gender roles (a bit?), objectfiying, sexualizing and racism. The app looks like a waste of time. Even if its laggy, it dosent mean that its the worst game ever. There are way worse games but this one is quite controversial..

Possibly the dumbest game I have ever downloaded. Seriously, I would recommend chugging tap water in Flint, Michigan, or licking truck stop door handles over downloading this game. If the game was remotely enjoyable, then the constant ads might be somewhat acceptable.

I think this game is soo good but, the only thing about it is adds Adds all day I hate if adds come up to many but it might not for you guys!! If your reading this please fix your game there's to many ads)!! Thx :)

Just wanted to see (as other people mention) how bad it is. Yes it is hilarious, but overall stupid. I did not find the courage to start it online. Giving one more star for offline play, making it good game when i am on toilet poop.

I like the game but as soon as you get like 85 percent your animals disappear and when you get a new pet with the same species the original goes away and then you get money and use it for your house once you get everything in the house you can't use it or exer
Kept kicking me out when i completed a level, also makes girls think they have to be perfect for guys and giving beauty standards. I rate this game 1 star because its boring and i cant play.

wrote customer service about restoring my $6 purchase a week ago and still no response. as much as we love the game this is really disappointing. starting to make me regret paying to support the creators and game. will update/change review if I hear back from them

This game was the best and it liked to show me after I played for like an hour it let me show the back screen of the game and I got to become one of the Home Screen employees so that's why I gave it a fivest game you could ever get in the world

This game is boring and offensive. The game revolves around you picking parts for your character so that they look good enough for the date of the level. It's uninteresting and suddenly uses ads as game mechanics and barely tells you. It's a frustrating mess and should be removed from the game store.

Downloaded this game on my 5year old's phone (managed by family link), as it's rated 3+, so age appropriate. The ads however are not! You advertise one specific game "make em" with very age inappropriate graphics in the ad before every level. Can you please check to not advertise age inapproriate games on lower age restricted games. Can't stop it even if I put my kid's phone on airplane mode.
This game is very fun! Except when there are many ads. I totally recommend this game to evryone😀. Thank you for making this game. This game was totally an entertainment. The best game ever!
No ads until 3 levels in, asked me to rate the game after the first level, game plays very much like every other game in this genre nothing new not worth the install

Just started, and this game is hilariously ridiculous. So far ad placement isn't too intrusive to the point where you're spending more time watching ads, than playing the game. Which inevitably leads to disengagement and higher Uninstallation. Let me not speak to soon before I jinx us all.
I feel this game makes girls think there not pretty, and has WAY to many ads I don't think this is a good game. It is also kinda inappropriate.

I read it before because it keeps logging me out and it keeps showing me ads actually I forgot it doesn't keep logging me out but I give it a four star review actually if they be rude if they log me out one more time I'm going to put it 3 and they don't like it I don't care 😘💗😘

So, I tried this game and it's amount of times that it closes out of the game while I am in the MIDDLE of a level and it is SO annoying. To the point where I can't even get past LEVEL TWO! Also, the ad doesn't even match the game and the fact that it's competitive is not in my liking whatsoever. It's just plain awful, I am so sorry for those like me who have tried this game and have just IDK maybe even just regretted that decision. So please do NOT get this game! Also the rating is actually 0.5.
great concept but waaaay to many ads and by the design of the graphics of the game its NOT worth purchasing AT ALL

Alright before I share the negative parts. I'd praise it for being a game that many can do for a laugh or just to pass time by. But it gets boring after a certain level, because the levels repeat. The challenges eventually end up being the exactly same as previous levels. And there's no real use for gathering pets. Also the house upgrades are limited. So in summary, don't waste your time. Extremely boring.

Very very very very very very very very very very very very very very Bad game. It's has a lot of a lot of ads which we cant even imagine. Every 1 minutes it's gives a nonsense ads. Poor games. Developers were mad who made this game. I dont even wanna play it.

This game is stupid. Don't. Download. It.
